name: Aweo Island
description:
I started with the RPG Adventure Game engine for gamemaker studio. 

I made the muic with Caustic Music Studio.

I made some artwork, but a lot of sprite work was done by Jason Perry. www.finalbossblues.com

This was my first project made in gamemaker studio, and a lot of my work was just reverse-engineering to learn how the software works.

I learned something every day of the jam and I hope to make this game longer and more engaging in the future!
